title: Illustration and Animation Honors (California State University, Fullerton)
text: ( Source : California State University, Fullerton ) The children's book series ' Monster and Me,' illustrated by Wendy Grieb, assistant professor of art, was awarded the 2015 Moonbeam Silver Medal for Best Picture Book Series . Grieb also had an
